lead_paragraph: Republicans have not budged from their opposition to a special bipartisan inquiry into Russian meddling in the election, and any links to President Trump or his aides.
snippet: Republicans have not budged from their opposition to a special bipartisan inquiry into Russian meddling in the election, and any links to President Trump or his aides....

headline.main: Majority Rule Means the Power to Stop, Not Just Start, an Investigation
